Plus, there’s $200 off the iPad Pro M4 13″ models and $100 off the 11″ model, a discount on the new iPad Air M3 models, a great discount on AirPods 2 with hearing aid features, and more.

Apple Watch Series 10 – $299 (down from $399)

Apple Watch Series 10 is available at a whopper discount right now on Amazon, and has a range of great features. You’ll find a 42mm always-on display, fitness tracking, activity tracking, heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection with emergency SOS, fall detection with Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gestures, water resistance, sweat resistance, voice control, Siri commands, all-day battery life, and more.

  • Get Apple Watch Series 10 for $299 (down from $399 MSRP)

M4 iPad Pro – $200 Off 13″ Model, $100 Off 11″

The iPad Pro lineup is rarely discounted by much, but right now Amazon is taking $200 off the price of the 13″ M4 iPad Pro, and $100 off the price of the 11″ model. iPad Pro features an M4 chip with support for Apple Intelligence, an XDR OLED display, 12MP front and back cameras, a LiDAR Scanner (which helps measure distances, just in case you need to do that with an iPad), Face ID, great battery life, support for Apple Pencil Pro, and more, and is available in black and silver color options.

  • M4 iPad Pro 13″ – 256GB – $1099 (down from $1299)
  • M4 iPad Pro 11″ – 256GB – $899 (down from $999)

If the M4 iPad Pro is more than you need, or you want to spend a little, less, the iPad Air series is also available at a discount on Amazon…

M3 iPad Air 11″ and 13″ – $565 (down from $599) and $759 (down from $799)

The M3 iPad Air is available with a discount on Amazon as well. Offering the powerful M3 chip with Apple Intelligence support, Liquid Retina LCD display (virtually flicker free for those with OLED PWM sensitivity), 128GB storage, 12MP front and rear camera, Touch ID, great battery life, support for Apple Pencil Pro, and is available in multiple color options.

  • M3 iPad Air 11″ – $565 (down from $599 retail)
  • M3 iPad Air 13″ – $759 (down from $799)

AirPods Pro 2 with Hearing Aid Functionality – $190 (down from $249)

AirPods Pro 2 are much more than standard earbud headphones, they also offer advanced features like hearing aid functionality for mild to moderate hearing loss, active noise cancellation, high fidelity sound, water and sweat resistance, Spatial Audio, custom fit, transparency mode, ear detection, a USB-C charging case, and more.

  • AirPods Pro 2 – $190 (down from $249)

M4 MacBook Pro 14″ & 16″ up to $320 Off

The M4 series MacBook Pro remains available at some nicely discounted prices on Amazon right now, in both 16″ and 14″ display sizes and various memory and storage configurations. If you need a powerhouse of a Mac, these are fantastic machines.

  • M4 MacBook Pro 14″ 16GB / 512GB for $1449 (down from $1599
  • M4 MacBook Pro 14″ 24GB RAM / 1TB SSD for $1829 (down from $1999)
